about.title: About Nocturide
about.subtitle: We're revolutionizing how developers build applications by combining the power of AI with modern web technologies.
about.missionSubtitle: To democratize software development by making advanced AI tools accessible to developers of all skill levels.
about.missionText: We believe that the future of development lies in the seamless integration of human creativity and artificial intelligence. By removing the complexity of setup, configuration, and boilerplate code, we enable developers to focus on what truly matters: building innovative solutions that make a difference.
about.builtForFutureText1: Nocturide IDE represents the next generation of development tools. We've eliminated the barriers between idea and implementation, allowing developers to focus on creativity rather than boilerplate code.
about.builtForFutureText2: Our AI-powered platform understands context, generates production-ready code, and adapts to your specific needs. Whether you're building a simple website or a complex enterprise application, Nocturide accelerates your development process.

templates.customText: Describe your project idea and our AI will create a custom template tailored to your specific needs.

whatIs.question: What is Nocturide?
whatIs.answer: Nocturide is an AI-powered web development environment that lets you create applications by simply describing them. The platform generates code, project structure, and all necessary components automatically.

howWorks.question: How does it work?
howWorks.answer: You describe what you want to create in the text field. Our AI analyzes your request and generates a fully functional application with modern technology stack. You can immediately start editing and customizing the code.

cost.question: How much does it cost?
cost.answer: We have a free plan with basic features. Paid plans start at $19/month and include advanced AI capabilities, unlimited projects, and priority support.

security.question: What about security?
security.answer: We use enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption, SOC2 compliance, and secure authentication. All data is stored in secure cloud services.

support.question: How do I get support?
support.answer: We provide support through email, Telegram, and documentation. Paid users get priority support. Average response time is 24 hours.

export.question: Can I export my code?
export.answer: Yes, you can export your entire project as a ZIP archive with full source code. GitHub integration is also available for version control.
